data.title: Cipher
data.solution:
import string
lm = int(input())
lk = int(input())
m = [int(i) for i in input().split()]
k = input()
s = string.ascii_uppercase
a = ""
for i in range(lm):
    a += s[m[i]-s.find(k[i%lk])]
print(a)
data.statement:
In this puzzle, you'll acquire an <<encrypted message>> and a <<keyword>>. Your mission is to decipher the message.

The message is encrypted by the following process:

(1) Write the message down and pick a keyword.

`<<Message:>>CODINGAME
<<Keyword:>>APPLE`
(2) Repeat the keyword until it matches the length of the message.

`<<Message:>>CODINGAME
<<Keyword:>>APPLEAPPL`
(3) Add the message and the keyword up letterwise by assigning the letters integer values from 0 to 25 in alphabetical order (i.e. A=0, B=1, C=2, etc.).

`<<Message:>>CODINGAME
<<Keyword:>>APPLEAPPL
<<Ciphertext:>>2 29 18 19 17 6 15 27 15`
data.constraints:
1 <= [[LK]] <= [[LM]] <= 100
There is no space or puctuation in the message.
data.stubGenerator:
read LM:int
read LK:int
loopline LM message:int
read keyword:string(LK)
write DECIPHERED_MESSAGE
data.inputDescription:
<<Line 1:>> An integer [[LM]] for the length of the encrypted message.
<<Line 2:>> An integer [[LK]] for the length of the keyword.
<<Line 3:>> [[LM]] space-separated integers represents the encrypted message.
<<Line 4:>> A single string in the capital letters with the length of [[LK]] represents the keyword.
data.outputDescription: <<Line 1:>> A single string in the capital letters with the length of [[LM]] represents the deciphered message.

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

In this puzzle, you'll acquire an encrypted message and a keyword. Your mission is to decipher the message.

The message is encrypted by the following process:

(1) Write the message down and pick a keyword.

Message:CODINGAME
Keyword:APPLE

(2) Repeat the keyword until it matches the length of the message.

Message:CODINGAME
Keyword:APPLEAPPL

(3) Add the message and the keyword up letterwise by assigning the letters integer values from 0 to 25 in alphabetical order (i.e. A=0, B=1, C=2, etc.).

Message:CODINGAME
Keyword:APPLEAPPL
Ciphertext:2 29 18 19 17 6 15 27 15
Input
Line 1: An integer LM for the length of the encrypted message.
Line 2: An integer LK for the length of the keyword.
Line 3: LM space-separated integers represents the encrypted message.
Line 4: A single string in the capital letters with the length of LK represents the keyword.
Output
Line 1: A single string in the capital letters with the length of LM represents the deciphered message.
Constraints
1 <= LK <= LM <= 100
There is no space or puctuation in the message.
Example
Input
9
5
2 29 18 19 17 6 15 27 15
APPLE
Output
CODINGAME
